title: Bug 116744 Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: When using a dynamic text element to display the contents of a database field with different types of content (HTML text within <html> tag, HTML fragments not within <html> tag, and text with RTF tags), the content type has no effect on how the text is displayed.
SR: To reproduce:1. Set up a database field with three types of content:HTML text within <html> tagHTML fragments not within <html> tagText with RTF tags2. Create a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field.3. Check if the dynamic text element correctly displays each type of content according to its content type.
